Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Elaina85
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights july didnt stay pricy town wa bit concerened reviews found expected reception communication phone found lara nice helpful fine becuase sleep comfortable clean alll nice kettle plates cups provided fine walked main attrations furthest eiffel tower 45 minutes hotel job

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Carol S
Reviews.Content: location st germain close metro station clean bathroom renovated nofrills hotel dont expect concierge service doesnt lobby breakfast youre looking reasonably priced hotel convenient clean hotel perfect reviewers complained noise streets faced interior didnt

Reviews.Title: “Truly not recommended for a stay with kids”
Reviews.Author: Ana C
Reviews.Content: nice stay paris kids reasons stay street paris night noise doesnt stop 5 morning double glazing lift suitable normal stroller nighmare access baby asleep bathroom tiny giving bath kids nighmare kids love vibes paris night enjoyable service poor

Reviews.Title: “Unbearably noisy!”
Reviews.Author: Teresa F
Reviews.Content: 4th floor couldnt hear talk loud tried sleep ear plugs pillows heads bars below narrow street dont close night weekend world cup rugby match france played music blarring base sang cheered unbelievable maid service clean linens weekends voice phone person usually called voicemail elevator average person suitcase barely fits overweight spiral stairs price clean sleep stay

Reviews.Title: “super location!”
Reviews.Author: Citysurfchic
Reviews.Content: dont care super clean pair trousers wardrobe hehe otherwise clean reception own loved stay rates location bring earplugs streets glad drunk people bars outside hotel otherwise enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Oustanding location, great value, highest possible recommendation”
Reviews.Author: ChrisandCristina
Reviews.Content: spent five night residences st sulpice christmas coul happier fantastic location walking distance louvre notre dame heart shopping eating city world huge plenty nice bathroom bath shower spotless cleaned standard daily hotel offers free wifi kitchenette hob fridge microwave flexibility cook own meals dont pay paris restaurant prices monoprix marks spencers couple streets food conventional hotel insofar reception desk restaurant collection self contained apartments beauitiful little building building hear single noise outside christmas call arriving arrived paris 15 minutes key electronic fob front door please overall superb stay expensive tremendous value paris please focus negative reviews site december 2010 fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - particularly if you dont wish to sleep!”
Reviews.Author: DukeandDuchessofyork
Reviews.Content: little hotel location tucked cool little bars cafes easily walkable paris size little fridge table chairs enjoy bread wine cheese lady spoke little english manageable bars street late lot noise til 4am recommend stay st germain gorgeous

HotelInfo.Name: Saint Sulpice Residence Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 23 Rue Guisarde, 75006 Paris, France
